website_summaries.verdict: This affordable wireless keyboard works excellently with the PlayStation 4.
pros: A wireless keyboard sporting 80 rubber keys and several backlight colors to choose from
The size is comfortable, and customers find the layout convenient
If you're looking for a budget remote to use with your PlayStation 4, this is a solid option that will work well with most PS4 apps
cons: This remote doesn't feature Bluetooth connectivity and instead uses a USB dongle to receive the signal

customer_reviews.title: Hi quality, great performance, exceptionally priced.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this keyboard. Be aware that it is not a full size keyboard, It is just a little bigger than my Samsung Galaxy smart phone. But I already expected it to be small. However; it is very solid, well laid out, easy and even fun to use. I purchased this one for my Raspberry Pi. It connected immediately (no configuration). I am about to purchase a second one for my laptop. For the price it is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M.

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best wireless mini keyboard that i have every used
customer_reviews.text: I heard a lot of positive things about this keyboard but i had to try it for myself. This is by far the best wireless mini keyboard that i have every used. It definitely lives up to its excellent reputation. I love that the back light comes in so many colors. The power button on the keyboard is a definite sell factor as well. Even the rectangular shape makes it feel more ergonomically designed for larger hands. Nice matted finish as well. I would strongly recommend this mini wireless keyboard to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Billie1966

customer_reviews.title: Best Geek Remote
customer_reviews.text: Yep, I'm a geek always messing around with the latest electronics, I love my computers and TV boxes. I have used most of the remotes you have seen on the web and I just had to take time to review this remote. Easy to use without accidentally hitting the wrong keys. Some of my other remotes would turn stuff off by just picking them up. The shape of this one makes it easy to hold, I did add some rubber tabs on the bottom to hold it more securely. The "OK" button is raised so you're not pressing an arrow button instead. This remote is great for the internet,Kodi or typing.
customer_reviews.author: Fly Robin

customer_reviews.title: Works great with a Smart TV Box
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace similar item that was dropped on the hardwood floor, and then decided to stop working after that little lick. Nevertheless, this was on a sale, so I did a "what the heck" purchase. This works great on my Smart TV Box (I have the KDLinks), even from a distance of about 10'-12'. The battery life is great so far, and the lights are a plus. The touchpad takes a bit of getting used to, but I'm not picky.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected. The perfect HTPC keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It's compact, the touch pad is smooth and responsive, range is excellent, multi-colored backlight is fun and useful, and build quality is good. I was looking for a small wireless keyboard for my HTPC, just to navigate Windows, not for any serious typing. Unlike most that have the Q, A, and Z all in one line, this one has correct QWERTY letter positions, features a power key, media keys, left and right mouse buttons, F keys, everything you need. I wasn't expecting much at this price point, but it does everything I need it to and does it well!
customer_reviews.author: CollierCatMan

customer_reviews.title: Cover for dongle is hard to open and close
customer_reviews.text: Removing the back cover is ridiculous. You have to pry the device using a tool and you feel like you are going to break it the whole time. You have to do this every time you need the USB dongle because this is where you store it when not in use. Very poor design which makes it difficult to use as an emergency keyboard/mouse for kiosk systems which is what I bought it for. If you are never going to remove the dongle once you plug it in you'll probably like it. Otherwise, you should pick something else.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my PS4 it's so cool you can pick it up and just type no issues. Changing the color was alittle hard to do with small hands but I was able to do it. It's awesome to have on hand when playing MMORPGS. You can talk to everyone in a guild ext. It's a fun little keyboard to own without a hassle to set up.
customer_reviews.author: RushAboutBusyTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: nice HTPC keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in June of 2018 and it has worked great for us since. Unfortunately I recently went to plug it in to recharge it and with little effort the micro usb plug broke loose from the circuit board, rendering the keyboard useless. I reached out to the seller about it and they promptly offered to send us a replacement keyboard. Top notch customer service. I'll chock up the broken usb port to a manufacturing flaw. Even the best brands put out a few lemons now and then.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Scott

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2, one for me another for my boyfriend. We both love it. Bought some adhesive bumpers from a hardware store to help when I hold it so it doesn't fall out my hand cuz it's personally a lil too flat. Love the lights. For battery life I charge maybe once a week I turn it off before I go to bed every night. It's a great keyboard. As a remote for my beelink it's pretty good. No serious complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Kwaii

customer_reviews.title: Finally a top of the line performance....
customer_reviews.text: Finally a larger than normal size for a Bluetooth keyboard and bonus touch pad also. This keyboard is quick to learn and even more fun. Everything thing works just like a full keyboard. I am 100% purchasing more of these keyboards for my friends and loved ones. This is a perfect size that there is a strong chance you can even learn to type 1 handed. The touch, look, functionality and performance of a over priced one, but is way way better
customer_reviews.author: What Chicago is Lovin

customer_reviews.title: works, replacable battery, dongle storage
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this mini, wireless, keyboard for less than 24 hours, otherwise I would give this product 5 stars. So, if it continues to work for at least a month, I will upgrade my rating to 5 stars. The back comes off per the instructions. Inside is a BL-5B LiIon replacable battery and a place for the USB dongle. Note: When replacing the back there two keys that must align with the corresponding holes. Amazon has the BL-5B battery and charger.
customer_reviews.author: Ancient-Geek

customer_reviews.title: Handy pc remote
customer_reviews.text: Extremely handy “remote” for my pc! My other streaming devices have had internet issues due to poor service options where I live so I started using a pc connected through Ethernet to watch shows (doesn’t need to buffer as much). It was really annoying having to constantly get up and go over to my pc to change shows so I searched for an option. I had never heard of these before but after searching for a while this one seemed to suit my needs. It’s a small device but is definitely not lacking any buttons. Now I can basically run my entire pc on my tv while sitting on the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Heath I.

customer_reviews.title: Died - less than 10 weeks after purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought September 1, died November 12. There are better models out there, keep looking. Doesn't cost much, but for 2 months of use, annoying to replace and pricey enough for the limited amount of use. Wasn't dropped or damaged, it was charging and simply refused to recognize I was pressing anything on the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: T. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Didn't really use it much
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying this to use for my Rasberry Pi setup and I can't say I ever used it too much. I thought having a tiny keyboard would be super useful, but honestly it's just kind of a pain. I'd consider getting a more normal sized wireless keyboard, like the Apple wireless keyboard, to get the best of both words. I still have this one and haven't returned it, but don't see myself using it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: great, for the price
customer_reviews.text: the keyboard itself is sturdy yet light with a strong responsive keyboard and backlight too boot. but im not sure if this is just with my keyboard i noticed a slightly annoying issue with the touch pad where it would random;y for some reason or another just stop working and i would have too shut off of and turn it back on to get it too work again making it a pain in the butt too navigate pages sometimes. other than that issue the keyboard does everything it says. it it wasn't for this technical issue i would rate this product 4.5 stars out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: RICK

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, nice little keyboard and touchpad. Nice little gadget. Has a solid feel. Only complaint is those finger decals on the touchpad...they are permanent. Would have been much better is that was a plastic overlay that peeled off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Gauntletwielder

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work Properly
customer_reviews.text: Parts of this work, and other parts don't. The whole point, of this thing, is to be able to have a bigger keyboard for typing in various areas via your Smart TV apps, but there are many apps that don't pickup the keyboard for this product. The arrows and the enter key work fine for most things, but everything else either doesn't work, or only sometimes works, depending on the apps you are using. If I could return it, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan David Lippens

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love mine! I got this to use in games on ps4 and it works wonderfully. Comes with the adapter for ps4, just plug it in and go! The colors are bright but dont blind you in the dark, and makes typing to my friends in game much faster. My only issue is that occasionally it will either not register a button press at all or it will register it twice so I end up with a few typos. But all in all for the cost it was much more than I expected! My cousin actually asked me to order him one as well!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Baureis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: the only thing I didn't like about this remote was the fact that the background lit up keypad takes two minutes to Auto shut-off, which kills the battery life faster,but besides that it's a keyboard in the palm of your hand that lights up at night, so I'm happy with the product, and I can't be too hearts of fleas with the price as well
customer_reviews.author: expozuremtb@instagram

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work on YouTube.
customer_reviews.text: If you need to search on demand or perhaps the internet its ok I guess but it will NOT work as a search function for YouTube which I use my SmartTV to surf more than anything else. Im not sure what the purpose of this is really. The remotes to the TV and Fios do the same thing for free.
customer_reviews.author: Right Back Atcha

customer_reviews.title: Great for your Smart T.V.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first mini keyboard I have every used. We purchased it just to use with our so called SMART t.v. It's very easy to connect and works great. If I catch it on sale again, I'm getting 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: LLP

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use for my Xbox One and it works just great! You can operate the main menu with it and can use it as a normal keyboard. I got it for playing Elder Scrolls Online because typing one key at a time to chat on that game was horrible and this made it so much faster! Hardly ever have to charge it since ive gotten it and its still going. Great little keyboard!
customer_reviews.author: Nebri

customer_reviews.title: Simply Doesn't Work.
customer_reviews.text: Simply doesn't work. My mouse cursor jerks wildly across my screen when I turn on this keyboard. I've followed all of the instructions, and tried it on three different machines, all with a different OS, with the same result. Save your money and buy from a more reputable company.
customer_reviews.author: NCP Filmmaker

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my firebox remote. It like the features and it works great... with the USB chip. I still can't get it to turn on the firebox with the power button. I still have to use the original remote (which is breaking).
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Belanger

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall build quality was just sub par. Price was decent at my time of purchase, but I honestly don't believe it was worth it. It's probably a couple of months since I bought this and it already doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: zack

customer_reviews.title: The one annoying thing is that the image that is shown on ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for about two months and have not encountered any issues yet. The one annoying thing is that the image that is shown on the touch pad is not a decal that can be removed. It's permanently embedded into the touch pad. But for the price, I still consider this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: The R

customer_reviews.title: Nice little keyboard for raspberry pi and other computers!
customer_reviews.text: I like how it is super tiny. Of course, it is a bit hard to type like a keyboard since it is small. I like the trackpad placement and the 7 colors. I think there should be something so I don't keep losing my Bluetooth dongle. Maybe using the charge port to plug into the computer so you don't need Bluetooth. I recommend buying though!
customer_reviews.author: Spankyty

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Plug and play. It needs a receiver to work. So basically anything with a USB port will work. I use it’s on my tv and it helps a lot because now I have a second remote basically. It even has a trackpad, which I did t think would work on my tv but it does. It changes color which is cool, and it is rechargeable via micro usb.
customer_reviews.author: SKGRN

customer_reviews.title: pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: this is pretty cool, works good on the internet part of my smart tv but still learning how to use it. like it though. colors are awesome showed a few but lots to pick from.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: If you look at the small prints on the description it says you need a USB cable and it is NOT bluetooth. Unfortunately the way the keyboard looks you would assume it's wireless. Why else would someone design a tiny remote like keyboard and require USB cable!
customer_reviews.author: GGG from SF

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing keyboard! I use it for my media PC ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing keyboard! I use it for my media PC in my workout room and it works flawlessly. I was happy to get a keyboard this small, but the mousepad is a great feature too. If you're looking for a keyboard to use occasionally, but don't want the space to be taken up with all of those accessories. This is a must!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Waggoner

customer_reviews.title: replaced by another
customer_reviews.text: I got this one and a similar but different (wish I could offer a link here) mini keyboard... I quit this one entirely and quickly. I'm sure it's here somewhere but who cares. I love the one I use. Battery still sucks bad, but remedied by swapping out battery boosters. Still, if you're in a spot like my bedside setup, these minis (probably a different one) just might be your solution too.
customer_reviews.author: 3allvalve

customer_reviews.title: Charging port broke
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold a charge nearly as well as competitors, especially with the back light on. After a week or so the charging port broke (normal use nothing crazy happened). Unfortunately this was a waste. I don't think it's worth buying a new one every time it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: ram

customer_reviews.title: I use this every day
customer_reviews.text: I got this as an add on to handle keyboard functions on my retropie but I 've started using it for much more. I love all the features and functions. Just wish it had a "shift" key on the right side.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good mini wireless keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Look inside the packaging. The usb nub was jammed in place. The actual keyboard has a spot for the nub inside the case. The case was not so easy to open. I checked inside for the usb nugget. And marred the case slightly. My bad. Works fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Tjp

customer_reviews.title: It has a mind of its own!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t no if I had a couple of bad ones or what.. but..when I left it on after using it would go bananas!!.. changed the channel,went back to home screen arrow danced all over the tv screen and it did the same with 2units.. looks great, easy to use but has a serious problem! It has a Mind Of It’s Own!
customer_reviews.author: michael tommy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible...issues all the time
customer_reviews.text: Its a shame because the design and the way all the buttons/keys are placed was great... but i bought 2 of these and they both have a mind of its own...clicking all the time without touching the thing.. deleted some of my stuff smh the cursor barely moved and sometimes i had to turn it on and off so it can function at times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Surprising small but powerful with a lot of options. Changing some of the button operations would have been nice, but overall great product. I will definitely purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a few months ago. Keys are a bit squishy and not the easiest to use, but worked fine for my use. Problem was that with VERY light use, it no longer held a charge. I would plug it in with the USB cord and the light would turn red to show charging, and it would turn off a few seconds later. Turning on the device and it would only last for seconds before dying out.
customer_reviews.author: Troy O.

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for manipulation around the TV Box we purchased, but the only thing that doesn't work is it will not turn the TV Box "On". Turns it off just fine, but won't turn it on lol. Small price to pay for convenience though, it works like a charm in every other way. I would defintely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Product as described, excellent seller, responded quick to questions regarding the product. I would highly recommend! I purchased this one to use it with the Raspberry Pi 3B+ and works perfect. Very nice design and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Script

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, with Great Functionality...If It Ain't Broke.
customer_reviews.text: Update: 10-01-18: I ordered a second one, that came broken. It was missing the usb plug in port on the bottom. I have it a soft shake to see if it was dislodged, but got no rattle. Thus I have a keyboard paperweight. Will see how Amazon and Okela determine to fix the problem. *Really enjoy the ease with which the remote offers on my Amazon Fire Box. No more hunt and peck typing. Red, yellow, purple, and blue allow to better see the Function keys and symbols, but orange, light blue and lime green are my favorites. Touchpad works great and has various sensitivity settings.
customer_reviews.author: tshinn777

customer_reviews.title: Good remote
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it's kind of complicated at first still getting use to it and the color change is hard to do but other then that it's a good remote I like air mouse better because you can just move the remote around and not a touchpad but this is a good remote no regrets
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could of use this more often. But I would connect it to my pc and connect that to my tv xD
customer_reviews.author: Sarath T. Sok

customer_reviews.title: This backlit keyboard works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great keypad and mouse for the price! Love how you can change the back color lights with ease, very distinguishable in the dark. Love this keyboard would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jethro.. 😎

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Connected it to my projector makes navigation simple and the backlight is perfect for movie room
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved me from buying new laptop
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver to prolong the use of my laptop when its keyboard started to malfunction. Perfect size to sit on top of the laptop keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: danielle blake

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed! I've used this for about one month with a Linux Mint 19 PC connected to my living room TV. USB wireless "dongle" included. Worked out-of-the-box! Touch pad supports right click and scrolling - with two fingers. Easy to setup and use!
customer_reviews.author: Just Some Dude

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but mighty
customer_reviews.text: It's super tiny, but has a lot of functionality. The variety of light colors is fun. It's also nice to have a mouse/keyboard combo.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Warranty.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device on January 14th 2018, and now the battery is dead. Where can return for warranty? It is hard to find this information and get help on this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dignity

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that you have seven different colors to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that you have seven different colors to choose from to light up when you're using it and it's compact and can do everything a regular size keyboard can do. It is easy to change the colors.
customer_reviews.author: michelle winston

customer_reviews.title: It is wireless but it needs a USB receiver to ...
customer_reviews.text: It is wireless but it needs a USB receiver to work. I thought it would also use Bluetooth but it doesn't so you can't use it with iPads or other tablets or phones.
customer_reviews.author: TsukiNoMegami

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth range diminished quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Neat product. Initially functioned very well but bluetooth range diminished after 2 weeks and could only use within 2 feet of receiver.
customer_reviews.author: pop pop

customer_reviews.title: Great price as well!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best wireless keyboard around, use it for your PC, Mac, Android and IOS devices.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C.

customer_reviews.title: Works nice to browse web via FireFox on Amazon Fire TV ...
customer_reviews.text: Works nice to browse web via FireFox on Amazon Fire TV box. Keypad is actually decent and responsive. The lighting is nice and battery life is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Dan El

customer_reviews.title: Works great thus far.
customer_reviews.text: No issues, using with the PS3 because I didn't want to pay 40$ for the remote specifically for the PS3. Working good so far, happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: A+++++
customer_reviews.text: Nice remote I use it for my abox. Was very suppressed at the quality for 14 bucks feels nice in hands and built to last will be buying 2 more for my other tvs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t hold charge
customer_reviews.text: Just got the keyboard yesterday, charged it overnight used it for about 30 min and it died. Charged it again, lasts about 15 min. Terrible results. I like the size and mouse pad but won’t hold a charge.
customer_reviews.author: John N.

customer_reviews.title: They work great. The range is great and I like back ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these to use for my TV computer. One for me and one for the wife. They work great. The range is great and I like back lighting. Wish the TV had as good of lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Jambo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them and we’ve bought friends and family keyboards too!! Great for your game boxes, movie boxes etc!! We always keep an extra one around the house just in case one cones up missing! Everyone loves them
customer_reviews.author: Shandra M.

customer_reviews.title: This thing's great! Perfect for my home projector and makes a ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing's great! Perfect for my home projector and makes a good wireless keyboard for my laptop. Has a good standby battery life, haven't run it for an extended time though so your mileage will vary. Touchpad works great compared to the built-in touchpads that this is being used in lieu of.
customer_reviews.author: Pause

customer_reviews.title: Did not work; returned
customer_reviews.text: The device appeared to charge, but would not turn on, and was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Mogollonian

customer_reviews.title: Easy and perfect for full classrooms
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my classroom, and the kids love it! Since some of my classes are very full, I can’t move around easily, so this makes things much better since I can pass it or use it at any part of my room better than a wireless mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren W.

customer_reviews.title: I Don't Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of this, makes it convenient for storing, but it does not do what I thought it would do. Not user friendly
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this keyboard. I paired it with a RaspberryPi and it worked great. It is very easy to use and is responsive. It’s a great value.
customer_reviews.author: The Philbins

customer_reviews.title: Best mini wireless keyboard for nvidia shield tv
customer_reviews.text: I love this little keyboard, great fit for my hands. I'm using this with my nvidia shield tv(2017). I like the fact that I can power down or put my shield to sleep from this keyboard. If anyone is having issue with lag or not connecting at times. Go get a usb extension cable and move it 1 - 2 feet away from the device that you're using it on.
customer_reviews.author: DaReal

customer_reviews.title: Much better than using the remote that came with the S-box.
customer_reviews.text: Using this with my S-Box. Works great since I paired it. Much faster than just using the remote that came with the box. Now I can type in www info than using the remote.
customer_reviews.author: DenAlex89

customer_reviews.title: Paired easily with TV box
customer_reviews.text: Paired with Globmall Android 7.1 tv box and works well. Much easier to setup apps with login information with this keyboard than using the standard remote.
customer_reviews.author: AmericanLunatic

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work on my xbox any more but it's fine on pc
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it is my keyboard or my xbox one but it worked fine for a couple days then some controll feature messed up the keyboard and makes it act like controll lock is on and I dont know how to turn it off. It affected both keyboards I got
customer_reviews.author: CROM

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my LG smart tv
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my LG smart tv. Does not work with my Sony Bravia. If you order it make sure your tv is compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Q9 keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I use it on Nvidia Shield and it is very acurate and very responsive!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Hakes

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Way to small. Impossible to type. Maybe good for gaming but not for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great multi use small keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Using this to control a chrombit for a visual tv. Great. Keypad is responsive. Immediate connection when plugged in and turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Charge!
customer_reviews.text: Plain and simple: battery DOES NOT hold a charge. Very disappointed. Really needed one of these for my Pi. Oh well
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and simple
customer_reviews.text: Nice and simple, I play with a lot of raspberry pi's and this makes setup easy! I did not like that there is no place to put the dongle.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Whitney

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: I've had several different small kb's like this and this is the worst yet. Touch pad is squirrely. Backlight is uneven on the keys and not really helpful. Just more tech landfill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tiny keyboard/touchpad combo, works great with Windows. Keys are large enough to be usable. Battery life is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M. Gioan

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Dude! This thing is fantastic, blown away by how simple it is to set up, how well it works and how useful it is. Using it with a smart tv box and it has opened up a new world of possibilities. Do recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Cable

customer_reviews.title: Need to turn on backlight!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped very quick! Very well designed, plug n play no configuration necessary. I bought to replace a mouse and keyboard for my media center, couldn't of asked for better. The only confusion I had was there was no backlights when I powered it on, so I thought it didn't have one. I was wrong, I just needed to manually turn it on. I recommend for any living room to replace full size keyboard and mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Hallmann

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months of use the mouse pad is broken. My TV is flipping out of control. I can't use it now. It was delivered and worked fine until now.
customer_reviews.author: susan twarowski

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I've bough several other mini wireless keyboards that have been junk. This one actually works well. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JosephLucas

customer_reviews.title: Good for occasional use. Wouldn't use on an every day basis.
customer_reviews.text: Forget about changing colors all but 1 are missing spots and you can't see the keys in dim lighting. Buttons are mostly ok some work great others gotta press a few times or they feel weak/gummy compared to the others that click well.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my raspberry pi. Worked awesome, and sizing was great.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Medina

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the money, but would suggest using a separate mouse.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Very nice quality. Keyboard has a good feel. Touchpad is tiny and difficult to use effectively... but is still fully functional. I purchased this to use with a Raspberry PI B+ and it worked great. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory L.

customer_reviews.title: Works with Raspberry Pi 3
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak as to how durable the keyboard will be but it worked right out of the box, was recognized by Raspberry Pi 3 B Noobs immedeately
customer_reviews.author: Storm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent plug and play connection
customer_reviews.text: Excellent plug and play for typing on your tablet. If you can type on your cellphone then you will like this.
customer_reviews.author: 149powder

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to pair
customer_reviews.text: Never could get it to pair and the instructions, on a wee wee tiny piece of paper, were useless. Shouldn't be that difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Luv My Pups

customer_reviews.title: It is where it belongs now. In the trash.
customer_reviews.text: Constantly had to turn on and off to keep it working . After about a month of this, the power button finally gave in and fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work on a 4K tv , does work on Xbox.
customer_reviews.text: Not compatible with the tv I bought it for but does work on Xbox, although a bit difficult to use occasionally. Cheaper than an Xbox chatpad though so it’s decent, and can potentially be compatible with other devices.
customer_reviews.author: Marion K. Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Keys may sometimes double type letters.
customer_reviews.text: One dislike certain keys may double and triple type letters, you will spend more correcting mistakes than actually typing passwords or login info.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Hicks Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I like the feeling of the keyboard and easy for me to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Bell

customer_reviews.title: One big issue
customer_reviews.text: Solid keyboard that mostly works great at first. There is a issue with the touchpad being active without being touch which causes the mouse to randomly move and click the screen. Can be fixed temporarily by turning it off then back on, but is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work
customer_reviews.text: I couldnt get it to work. It was missing the nano receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Andrewslogs

customer_reviews.title: happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: very happy with purchased, worked as described and arrived on time
customer_reviews.author: mitch

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Bright. Works.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! Replaced my Rii keyboard with this. Perfect for the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is dongle only compatibility not 802.11
customer_reviews.text: Works great to cast my chromeboom to the tv and chill out with the wireless keyboard. Pretty good battery life, deecent comptibility, good form factor. Another note the touch pad works quite well for something in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Strozeski

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: It was simple to set up. NO excessive interface. Used with an LG TV and firestick
customer_reviews.author: Amythistdiva

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly as described, connected very easily and works really well. Very slim design and easy to hold. Extremely happy i came across this keyboard while looking for others of a similar type. If you can type with an iPhone7 horizontally then you can type with this....physically its about the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: The think I liked most was it worked the way it’s described to ...
customer_reviews.text: The think I liked most was it worked the way it’s described to do so and it’s very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: PA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy, easy to use. Would buy another for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Cool nana

product_meta.title: Mini Wireless TV Keyboard and Touchpad Mouse Combo with Colorful Backlit, Q9 2.4Ghz Colorful Backlit Handle Control for Android TV Box, Windows PC, HTPC, IPTV, Raspberry Pi, 360, PS3, PS4 by Okela
feature_bullets: 3 in 1 MultiFunction 2.4GHz Mini Wireless QWERTY keyboard and TouchPad combo, LED colorful backlit handle remote with USB interface adapter, perfect for PC, Android TV Box, Google TV Box, Xbox 360, PS3, HTPC, IPTV.
80 keys QWERTY mini wireless keyboard, add multimedia function keys and hot keys, more convenient for typing, searching and remote control.
Built-in high sensitive smart touchpad with 360-degree flip design, cursor speed adjustable.
Bright and clear backlit, colorful backlit including red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, violets switch randomly, more convenient when lack of light.

Warranty: please be advised that we offer 12 Months Warranty and 60 Days Money Back Guarantee, order today! Special Notice: This keyboard connect the device via a USB dongle, do not have Bluetooth function, not compatible with iPad, Fire TV and Fire Stick.
